title.narrative: Combating Arthropod Pest for Better Health Food and Resilience to Climate Change (CAP-Africa)

description.narrative: CAP-Africa is a programme grant built upon three strategic research thrusts: Global health to reduce the burden of malaria and emerging infectious diseases; Climate change to fill critical gaps in knowledge on climate change impact on ecosystem services and invasive pests and deploying climate-smart technologies to improve food security and systems resilience; and Education to train postgraduate level for leadership in scientific research, development, policy and technology dissemination
